h2_title: Water-Wood Beast Boss Fight and Guide
img_above_text:
# Water-Wood Beast
Water-Wood Beast is one of the optional Yaoguai Chiefs you can fight in Chapter 6 of Black Myth: Wukong"). This hidden beast lurks beneath the water and will try to catch you by surprise as much as it can.
## Water-Wood Beast Boss Fight and Guide

In general, you want to stick behind the beast as much as you can. It will try to lunge and bite at you if you face it head-on, so this removes some of the problem of dodging those attacks. Immobilize will also help you out here, as similar to the rhino, it will move around and you'll want to be able to take advantage of those frozen moments as much as possible. Though you will want to watch out for it bucking and kicking back.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the boss fight against the Water-Wood Beast in *Black Myth: Wukong*. The beast, a massive, tree-like creature with glowing fiery patches, is partially submerged in water, emphasizing its aquatic nature and hidden ambush tactics. The player character, armed with a staff, stands in the water, preparing to engage the beast. The surrounding environment features lush greenery and foothills, reinforcing the natural and mystical setting described in the guide. This visual complements the strategy outlined in the text, which advises staying behind the beast to avoid frontal attacks and utilizing immobilization techniques during the fight.
